original_body_lines: Bathiya and Santhush seem to be having an exciting start to the New Year.
They have got two prestigious tours coming up – to the UK and the USA.
Their first New Year gig, in London, is scheduled for February 25th, 2024, and the venue is Indigo at The O2.
They will have for company Umaria and Randhir and the band LunuDehi.
The same setup will be action in the USA, as well: Tampa – March 22, New York – March 23, Houston – March 30th, San Francisco – April 05th, and Los Angeles – April 06th.
Last year, Bathiya and Santhush were very much in demand for concerts overseas.
